numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Young men are less likely to reach out to their parents than young women are.
2. Young men reach out to their parents by sending texts.
3. Young men reach out to their parents by phone.
4. Young men reach out to their parents by video-chat.
5. Young men reach out to their parents by visiting their parents in person.
6. I wonder whether pride causes this behavior in men.
7. I wonder whether jobs keep young men more busy.
9. This topic relates to my community.
10. I try to reach out to my parents.
11. I reach out to my parents by at least 1 of the 3 reasons that are listed on the graph.
12. A possible headline is: Being In Contact: How Often Do Young People Reach Out To Their Parents?
